member.name: T:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation
member.summary: Represents the product and edition for a license instance.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new LicensedProduct.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.ProductName
member.summary: The name of the product.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.LicenseName
member.summary: The edition for the license.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.MaxVersion
member.summary: Maximum version for which the license is valid.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.UseStrongAlgorithm
member.summary: Indicates if the license should be created using military strength algorithms.
member.remarks: This value is not set when a license has been validated.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.ToString
member.summary: Converts to a string.
member.returns: A string representation of the product.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string representation of a product to a LicensedProductInformation instance.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.CanParse(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates if a string is parseable to a LicensedProductInformation.
member.param: The string representation of a product.
member.returns: True if the string is parseable.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedProductInformation.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.
member.param: The Object to compare with the current object
member.returns: true if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedUser
member.summary: A user for a license.
member.remarks: Name and Company may not contain the following symbols | , @

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedUser.CreateForName(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new User using only a name.

member.summary: Creates a new User using name and company.
member.param: The name of the users company.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedUser.CreateForEmail(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new User using only an email.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedUser.CreateForEmail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new User using an email and the users company.

member.summary: The users email.

member.summary: The users company.

member.summary: Parses a string into a LicensedUser

member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.

member.name: T:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber
member.summary: Represents an application version number for licenses. LicensedVersionNumbers are used to indicate the maximum application version that license is valid for, the wildcard * is valid for parts of the version.
member.remarks: * is not valid for major version if minor version has an integer value i.e. *.4 is not valid.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Version Number for a license. This will default to *.*

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Version Number for a license.
member.param: The major version part of the version number.
member.remarks: The minor part will default to *.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Version Number for a license.
member.param: The major version part of the version number.
The minor version part of the version number.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.MajorVersion
member.summary: The Major version part of the version number.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.MinorVersion
member.summary: The Minor version part of the version number.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string into a LicensedVersionNumbner

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.CanParse(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates if a string can be parsed into a LicensedVersionNumber.
member.returns: True if the string is parseable.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicensedVersionNumber.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.
member.param: The Object to compare with the current object
member.returns: true if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicenseInformation
member.summary: Represents all the information available about a license instance.

member.summary: The product, version and edition that this license is valid for.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicenseInformation.LicensedTo
member.summary: A plain string representing the user.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicenseInformation.ValidUntil
member.summary: The license expiration date.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicenseInformation.Serial
member.summary: The serial part of this license.

member.name: P:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.LicenseInformation.LicenseKey
member.summary: The cryptographic signature of this license.

member.name: T:Habanero.Licensing.Shared.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains types used for both license validation and generation.

member.name: M:Habanero.Licensing.Util.StringHelper.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(System.String)
member.summary: Provides an extension method for string IsNullOrWhiteSpace to support this behavior in .Net 3.5
member.returns: true if the string is null, empty or composed entirely of whitespace.
